title: Country Living with an Easy Commute to Town
map_address: Bauer Gulch Drive near Kennons Way
posting_body: Are you sick and tired of having your rent increased on you every year?
NOW IS THE TIME TO BUY!!!!
You can lock in your monthly payment and OWN your own home!
We can help you with your dream of homeownership.
Master Suite with LARGE Walk-In Closet
Easy commute to: Fairfield, Spring, Cypress, Jersey Village, Tomball, Hockley and Waller.
If responding to ad by email please include your name, phone number, and a link to the post you are inquiring about.
*P & I. Price $297,900, 5.625% Fixed/6.453% APR, 3.5% Down, FHA 30 Year, OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
